Good Comments: Overall translation were fine, too many grammer mistakes around 16+, no, not every sentence, but enough to realize half asset work.
soooo many grammar mistakes, really horrible to follow :/
More spelling mistakes than I made when I was five.
Bad Comments: Too many spell and grammar errors. Stay with The Triad.
few spelling errors but fine overall

Good Comments: Great 720p release since THORA dropped theirs and went with 1080p. If you don't want episodes nearly a gig in size, get this. Only downside is that the OPs and EDs are separate files despite the fact that there are no ordered chapters.
Bad Comments: 720p using Menclave subs. What's to fucking hate?
